member.name: M:Intent.Modules.Common.Java.Templates.JavaTemplateBase`1.AddDependency(Intent.Modules.Common.Java.Templates.JavaDependency)
member.summary: Adds the which can be use by Maven or Gradle to import dependencies.

member.name: M:Intent.Modules.Common.Java.Templates.JavaTemplateBase`1.ImportType(System.String)
member.summary: imports the fully qualified type and returns its reference name. For example, java.util.List will import java.util.List and return List.

member.summary: Resolves the type name of the as a string. Will automatically import types if necessary.

member.name: M:Intent.Modules.Common.Java.Templates.JavaTemplateBase`1.DeclareImports
member.summary: Override this method to add additional imports to this java template. It is recommended to call base.DeclareImports().
